author: _shemnon
content: These retroactive EIPs are discussed n ACD, and I would look for their inclusion in EIP-7675 for when they become canonical.  One condition for all the retroactive EIPs so far is it doesn't matter when they are activated because they address issues that have not occured on mainnet, typically because they are impossible.  EIP-3541 (reserve EF contracts) would be a good example of one that couldn't be retroactive, because it was fairly easy to do and some people did in fact publish small contracts that caused some design issues.
